ghost.objects

Class Moving

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.objects.Moving
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ghost, Waka

    public abstract class Moving
extends java.lang.Object
    Moving represents all of the objects that will be moving, namely, Waka and the ghosts

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Moving.Direction
      Direction in which Waka or the ghosts shall be moving
